on reading compounds: 佩【ハイ】ancient oriental belt decoration, counter for swords
佩剣【ハイケン】wearing a sword
kun reading compounds: 履く【はく】to put on (lower-body clothing, e.g. pants, skirt, footwear), to wear, to affix (a sword to one's hip), to affix (a bowstring to a bow)
佩びる【おびる】to wear, to put on (a sword)
